instruction: Create a song based on the following theme: "love in the time of darkness".
output:
Verse 1:
When loneliness comes through the night
I'm standing here with a broken heart
But when the morning finally arrives
A ray of hope can start 
For the sun will take all the dark away
And wash away my sorrow

Chorus: 
There is still love in the time of darkness
Although it's hard and I feel so helpless
Though there's shadows that fill my door
I'm still searching for something more

Verse 2: 
As I look in the clouds I see my dreams 
The future is for me to take
So now I'm walking and I'm talking 
Trying to find my place
For I will reach for the stars above
And take away my pain 

Chorus: 
There is still love in the time of darkness
Although it's hard and I feel so helpless
Though there's shadows that fill my door
I'm still searching for something more

Bridge:
When all my hope is gone 
I'm still looking to carry on 
Don't be afraid to feel the love
Inside the time of darkness 

Chorus:
There is still love in the time of darkness
Although it's hard and I feel so helpless
Though there's shadows that fill my door
I'm still searching for something more
